name: code-inspiration
description: Capture snippets of code inspiration while on the go.

scripts.prod: npm run build && npm start # I added this based on the README
scripts.surge: npx sapper export; surge __sapper__/export https://code-inspiration.surge.sh; open https://code-inspiration.surge.sh

hooks.pre-commit: npm run dev & (npm run reminder; sleep 3; if (npm run test); then (npm run reminder); else (npm run reminder && exit 1); fi;);
